T1592.001.command: Get-CimInstance -Query "SELECT * FROM Win32_PnPEntity WHERE (PNPClass = 'Image' OR PNPClass = 'Camera')" | Out-File T1592.001.txt

T1595.003.command:
GET SCRIPT, GET DICT, ----> Import-Module "PathToAtomicsFolder/T1595.003/src/WebServerScan.ps1"
Invoke-WordlistScan -Target "#{target}" -Wordlist "#{wordlist}" -Timeout "#{request_timeout}" -OutputFile "#{output_file}"
Write-Host "Scan complete. Results saved to: #{output_file}"
